page.title: 20SOCIAL COMMENTS ON HASELOR
page.content: The block allocated to Haselor J.&I. School is mainly arable land with some grassland and woodland.There are a few outlying dwellings but the main centre of population is in Haselor village. Although there are many families that have moved in from other areas and the socio-economic spread is wide there is a good community spirit in the village The Haselor Amenities Group organise many activities throughout the year;a Harvest Supper and Barn Dance, a Cycle Treasure Hunt,a Cricket Match and they put on the occasional concert.For the past 3 years they have entered a float in Stratford's Carnival and walked off with all the prizes.With the money raised they like to hold a summer treat for the children and remember the old people at Christmas. At the school gate before and after school the community spirit is fostered.
